group_1.textRight: ..Well gee, I can't say I expected@an invite from you of all people.
Thanks so much for the invitation...

group_1.textLeft: (I know I promised Sumomo I'd bring@some friends and all that, but...)
(I'm not normally friendly with these guys,@so doin' stuff like this is kinda tough for me.)
(This seems like a place Mami might like,@but I'd feel too weird calling her...)

group_1.textRight: So, can I start getting psyched up about@that chocolate cake masterpiece now?!
I'm planning to use it as a reference for my@handmade Valentine's chocolates, you know!

group_1.textLeft: I want to do something like that too, for sure...!

group_1.textRight: I wanted to call Madoka over too,@but Homura told me not to, so...

group_1.textLeft: S-sorry.
I wanted to keep it secret from Madoka@that I'm making friendship chocolate...

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you guys waiting!
One Raspberry Choco Tart and@one Pumpkin Choco Souffle!
[chara:801202:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And finally, one Chocolate Apple Pie!
Big Sis Kyoko.
Thanks again for bringing your friends over!

group_1.textLeft: Yuuup, just like I promised!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, you doting on someone younger than you?@What rare miracle is this?

group_1.textLeft: N-never mind what I'm doing,@now let's shut up and eat.

group_1.textRight: Right, now then...

group_1.textLeft: T-this...is...

group_1.textRight: DELICIOUS!!!
What is this?@It's actually moved me to tears!

group_1.textLeft: I...that extra sweetness made@me feel lightheaded for a second.

group_1.textRight: Yay!

group_1.textLeft: Was I right, or was I right?

group_1.textRight: On that note, what is it that made@you wanna show us this place?

group_1.textLeft: Well, actually...

group_1.textRight: Kyubey's got his sights on this girl...?
So, to prevent her from having to make a wish,
you decided to generate more publicity for the shop.

group_1.textLeft: Yep. If you liked the stuff here,@mind invitin' your friends over too?

group_1.textRight: Well, if it's for a place with food this tasty,@I'll gladly help out!
I'm sure Madoka and Mami@will feel the same way.
I think we should tell Iroha and@the others in Kamihama about it, too!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for your help!
I wanna spread the word about this place@to as many people as possible.

group_1.textRight: Thank you!@Big Sis Kyoko and her friends!
Going with the honest straightforward campaign,@are we?

group_1.textLeft: You little...@You've got some balls, coming around here again.

group_1.textRight: All you have to do is make a wish.
Then you wouldn't have to use a roundabout,@convoluted method like that.

group_1.textLeft: If I give you my wish...
It'll make it so everyone comes@over here to eat my dad's cakes?

group_1.textRight: That's right.
This shop doesn't seem to be in@very good shape as it stands, though.
With your wish, becoming the #1 most popular@shop in town will no longer be just a dream either.

group_1.textLeft: Sumomo, don't lend one ear to this guy.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...but...

group_1.textLeft: Sure, what he says is true.@You can wish for a miracle to happen.
Then, your beloved dad...
If he found out the real reason all those people were@suddenly flocking here, what would you do then?
If he found out that his own daughter's magic@tricks were the cause of his success...
If it was all because of your selfish meddling@and nothing else, what would he think?

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textLeft: There's one idiot out there who made a wish@like that, and it tore her family apart.
...Yeah, that idiot is me.
I wished for a miracle for the sake of other people,@and that's how it turned out.
So please, all I ask is that you don't end up like me.

group_1.textRight: All right then, Big Sis Kyoko,@you've got my promise!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Kyubey.
Me and my Dad are gonna do our best@without relying on miracles.
He left, huh...
You're a good kid, Sumomo.@Now do your best to keep your promise!

group_1.textRight: [chara:801202:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: ...Welp, we gotta get going.

group_1.textRight: Ah...@Big Sis Kyoko.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: No...@[chara:801202:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:801202:lipSynch_1]It's nothing.
